title: 52  Filippo Tommaso Marinetti, After the Marne, Joffre Visited the Front by Car, from Futurist Words in Freedom, Milan, 1919
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">52  
Filippo Tommaso Marinetti (Italian, 1876–1944)  
After the Marne, Joffre Visited the Front by Car, from Futurist Words in Freedom  
Published by Futurist Editions of Poesia, Milan, 1919  
Letterpress foldout plate following page 99; closed: 19 cm × 12.5 cm (7 1/2 × 4 15/16 in.); open: 26 × 23.5 cm (10 1/4 × 9 1/4 in.)  
Mary Reynolds Collection, Ryerson and Burnham Libraries, Art Institute of Chicago, 709.04063 R46 no.152.2
